org.teamfarce.mirch.screens.elements

Class InterviewResponseBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.teamfarce.mirch.screens.elements.InterviewResponseBox

  • public class InterviewResponseBox
extends java.lang.Object
    The InterviewResponseBox is used within the InterviewScreen Used to present the player with options for responding to a Suspect
